baseline_texts: The frame shows a close-up of a person's hand holding a small object, which appears to be a razor blade or a similar thin, flat metal item. The background is a plain, textured white wall, and there is a white surface below where the shadow of the object and hand is visible. The lighting is soft, causing a clear shadow on the surface.

The image shows a close-up of a hand holding a syringe horizontally. The background is a plain, textured white wall, and the syringe appears to be empty. The surface below the syringe is light-colored and has some faint marks or stains. The overall lighting is even, and the focus is on the syringe and the hand holding it.

The frame shows a pen lying horizontally on a white surface, which appears to be a table or desk. The background features a plain, light-colored textured wall. In the upper right corner of the frame, a hand is partially visible, either moving quickly or just entering the frame, causing a slight blur. The surface also has some small marks or stains.

This frame shows a simple scene with a white or light-colored desk or table surface and a plain, textured wall in the background. On the table, there is a single ballpoint pen lying horizontally near the center of the frame. The pen has a mostly white body with a metallic or silver-colored tip and clip. The scene is minimalistic with no other objects or decorations visible. The lighting appears even and natural.

The frame shows a simple scene with a pen lying horizontally on a white surface, possibly a table or desk. The background is a plain, textured wall with a light color, likely beige or off-white. The image is minimalistic, with no other objects or distinct features visible except a small portion of something on the right edge, which is not clear enough to identify.

This frame shows a minimalistic scene with a close-up of a white desk surface against a textured light gray wall. On the desk lies a transparent ballpoint pen with a purple cap and a black ink cartridge inside. The lighting appears soft, and the composition is simple and clean.

The frame shows a close-up view of a ballpoint pen lying horizontally on a white surface. The pen has a transparent body with a visible ink cartridge inside and a purple tip. The background consists of a textured, light-colored wall. The overall scene is simple and minimalistic.

This frame shows a simple scene with a white surface, likely a table or desk, against a beige or light-colored textured wall. On the surface, there is a single pen lying horizontally. The pen has a transparent body with a purple cap. The setting appears minimalistic and the lighting suggests it may be indoors with soft, even light.
